props.clippedLeft: Designates that the application's `v-navigation-drawer` that is positioned on the left is below the app-bar.
props.clippedRight: Designates that the application's `v-navigation-drawer` that is positioned on the right is below the app-bar.
props.collapseOnScroll: Puts the app-bar into a collapsed state when scrolling.
props.fadeImgOnScroll: When using the **src** prop or `img` slot, will fade the image when scrolling.
props.hideOnScroll: Hides the app-bar when scrolling. Will still show the `extension` slot.
props.invertedScroll: Hides the app-bar when scrolling down and displays it when scrolling up.
props.scrollOffScreen: Hides the app-bar when scrolling. Will **NOT** show the `extension` slot.
props.shrinkOnScroll: Shrinks a **prominent** toolbar to a **dense** or **short** (default) one when scrolling.

slots.extension: Slot positioned directly under the main content of the toolbar. Height of this slot can be set explicitly with the **extension-height** prop. If this slot has no content, the **extended** prop may be used instead.
slots.img: Expects the [v-img](/components/images) component. Scoped **props** should be applied with `v-bind="props"`.
